xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.9 Hetuduka, Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika » 1.9.2 Bhāvanāyapahātabbahetukapada » 1.9.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika
Bhāvanāyapahātabbahetukapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
296.
603Hetu bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo hetussa bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
297.
604Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
605Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
606Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
607(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetu-ārammaṇaup1.9.3 Nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbahetukapada >>
